circumstances: Sheila Evans was last seen at a local shopping mall by her sister, amid growing concerns over her increasing obsession with an online gaming group. Friends noted she often pulled back from social gatherings, spending hours engrossed in her new digital world. After departing the mall, CCTV footage captured her wandering near a storm drain close to the marina, a location that seemed at odds with her usual routine. With no signs of returning home that evening, her worried grandmother, Joyce Williams, alerted the authorities. The swift coordination by police led to her being traced at an unexpected location the next day, where she was found safe, albeit disoriented and deeply absorbed in her virtual game interactions.
